div.p:
J.L., S.-M.L., R.S., K.H., A.D., R.L.M., J.O., M.W., and R.M. all contributed to the collection of aircraft observations in the field. R.S., R.M., R.L.M., and K.H. made the CO 2 and CH 4 measurements and subsequent QA/QC of data. A.D. contributed to the development of TERRA. J.O. made measurements of NO
X and subsequent QA/QC of data. D.W. and F.V. provided GHG inventory information. J.L. and S.-M.L. wrote the paper with input from all co-authors.
